Class OVRTextureHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRTextureHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class OVRTextureHeader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    API-independent part of a texture descriptor.
